duties_responsibilities.duty: Delivery ownership of assigned module and creation of reusable, effective, and scalable code.
Identifying bottlenecks and bugs in the system, and developing solutions.
Conducting software analysis, testing, updating, and debugging.
Developing MVP User Stories, supporting backlog creation, prioritization, and Story mapping.
Ability to work across tiers – UI development, APIs, databases, and utilize DevOps CI/CD pipeline.
Responsible for assigned task delivery, quality, and knowledge transfer through daily pairing with team members.
Strong understanding of core AWS services, uses, and AWS architecture best practices. Proficient understanding of AWS services such as S3, EC2 and more.
Able to use a CI/CD pipeline to deploy applications on AWS. Strong understanding of security best practices.
